article: It's Saturday afternoon. It's  _  and warm. There is a little wind. There are many people in the Yongtai District. What are they  doing  there? Some  old men  are playing chess. Some  _  are walking  _  the garden. Some boys are  _  basketball. Two girls are  _  a storybook. What  _  those old women? They're  doing  exercise to keep healthy. Look! Two cats are  _  the tree. There are some birds in the tree. They want to catch the birds!
